column.name: import_datasource_id
column.text: 报表志入数据的数据源Id

column.name: import_datasource_name
column.text: 报表志入数据的数据源名称

column.name: type
column.text: 报表内容类型： 1=SQL 2=Table 3=View 4=http_json 5=存储过程

column.name: column_sql
column.text: 据SQL用于导入字段用，可以直接执行

column.name: report_sql
column.text: 报表SQL，带参数的真实报表SQL

column.name: layout
column.text: 报表页面布局:1=左右布局 2=上下布局 3=左上下（用于子报表，左是高级查询区） 4=上上下（用于子报表，上是高级查询区）

column.name: search_area_control_num_per_row
column.text: 高级查询区每行显示几个查询控件

column.name: show_pager
column.text: 报表数据是否分页:1=分页 0=不分页

column.name: sort_mode
column.text: 排序模式 1=客户浏览器端排 2=服务器端排序

column.name: export_mode
column.text: 数据导出的模式, 1=默认全部字段数据导出 2=用户选择字段导出

column.name: import_mode
column.text: 数据导入的模式, 1=默认全部字段数据导入 2=用户选择字段导入

statements.statement:
select * from rpt_definition where 1=1 <#if query??> <#-- -------------------关键字查询开始 --------------- --> <#if query.key??> <#assign key = StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)/> and ( definition_name like '%${key}%' or definition_short_name like '%${key}%' or
datasource_name like '%${key}%' or
category_name like '%${key}%' or
remark like '%${key}%'
) </#if> <#if query.ids??> and id in (${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.ids)}) </#if>
<#if query.id??> and id = ${query.id} </#if>
<#if query.categoryId??> and category_id = ${query.categoryId} </#if>
<#if query.datasourceId??> and datasource_id = ${query.datasourceId} </#if>
<#if query.name??> and name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.name)}' </#if>
<#if query.exportMode??> and export_mode = ${query.exportMode} </#if>
<#if query.importMode??> and import_mode = ${query.importMode} </#if>
<#if query.categoryName??> and category_name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.categoryName)}' </#if>
<#if query.datasourceName??> and datasource_name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.datasourceName)}' </#if>
<#if query.shortName??> and short_name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.shortName)}' </#if>
<#if query.code??> and code = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.code)}' </#if>
<#if query.type??> and type = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.type)}' </#if>
<#if query.url??> and url = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.url)}' </#if>
<#if query.dbType??> and db_type = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.dbType)}' </#if>
<#if query.status??> and status = ${query.status} </#if>
<#if query.appCode??> and app_code = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.appCode)}' </#if>
<#if query.sn??> and sn = ${query.sn} </#if>
<#if query.remark??> and remark = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.remark)}' </#if>
<#if query.createTimeBegin?? && query.createTimeEnd??> and date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeBegin)}' and '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeEnd)}' </#if>
</#if>
